actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the status of preference eligible to the spouse or dependent parent of a member of the armed forces in a missing status, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the extension of the status of preference eligible to the spouse or dependent parent of a member of the Armed Forces in a missing status. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 2108, 3305, 3309 and 3318).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to extend the status of preference eligible to the spouse or dependent parent of a member of the armed forces in a missing status, and for other purposes.
